data.name: Dialog.Description
data.value: You have added one or more H5Ps as external learning material. H5Ps must first be checked for functionality before they can be used successfully in a learning world. This involves checking whether points can be earned within the H5P by answering questions (e.g., H5P - Interactive Video) and whether the H5P can therefore be completed, or whether it is a non-completable H5P in which simply clicking through the individual slides is decisive (e.g., H5P - Image Slider). It is also possible that an H5P is faulty or does not display at all. A basic distinction is made between three states of an H5P: [[ICON_LIST]] You can find out more here.

data.name: Dialog.Instruction
data.value: Learning worlds with unchecked or unusable H5Ps cannot be uploaded. You can check the H5P now or later.
